properties.entry: SELECT MESSAGE_NO , MESSAGE_TITLE , MESSAGE_RECEIVER , MESSAGE_RECEPIENT , MESSAGE_RECEIVE_TIME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MEMBER ON (MESSAGE_RECEIVER=USER_ID) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID=? ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC
SELECT MS.* FROM MESSAGE MS JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID =MS.MESSAGE_RECEIVER) WHERE USER_ID = ?
